name: Communication
short_description:
This is a pedagogical tool that was started in 1999 to help my colleagues understand the working of convolutional coding and virterbi decoding algorithms. 

The project is socket-based network-aware application that consists of three sub-projects:-

1. Transmitter
This is the program that transmits data after applying convolutional coding.

2. Channel
This is the program that emulates a wireless channel, where user can alter the level of noise. The more the noise is, more the chances of bit-reversals.

3. Receiver
This is the program that receives signals from Channel and reconstructs the data that was transmitted by Transmitter.

Enjoy.
summary: A pedagogical tool to teach digital communication
